FuncDef:
The management-acl disable command disables the management protocol ACL delivering function.
The undo management-acl disable command restores the default settings.
By default, the management protocol ACL delivering function is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When there is no need to filter out invalid management protocol packets to be sent to the CPU using hardware, run the management-acl disable command to disable the management protocol ACL delivering function.
Configuration Impact
This command controls ACL filtering on the forwarding plane, and does not affect functions on the control plane.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
